original_text: Then David knew that the Lord had established him as king over Israel and had exalted his kingdom for the sake of his people Israel.
korean_text: 다윗이 여호와께서 자기를 세우사 이스라엘 왕으로 삼으신 것과 그의 백성 이스라엘을 위하여 그 나라를 높이신 것을 알았더라

sentences.original_text: that the Lord had established him as king over Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그를 이스라엘의 왕으로 세우셨다는 것을

sentences.original_text: for the sake of his people Israel
